meanings.sent1: She is the sexiest person in the room.
meanings.sent2: The movie star was voted the sexiest celebrity of the year.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought it was the sexiest creature in the house.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in the sexiest shades of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked cookies was the sexiest smell in the kitchen.

meanings.definition: Most appealing in a sexual manner.
meanings.sent1: He wore the sexiest outfit to the party.
meanings.sent2: The lingerie model displayed the sexiest collection on the runway.
meanings.sent3: The car wash was the sexiest event in town.
meanings.sent4: The dance performance was the sexiest display of talent.
meanings.sent5: The chocolate cake was the sexiest dessert on the menu.
